pages.title: Output
pages.text: This slot indicates the currently selected recipe's output.$(br2)Clicking crafts one object using items in either the drawer or the player's inventory.$(br2)Shift clicking will craft up to 64 of the selected item, depending on the number of ingredients available.

pages.title: Recipe Selector
pages.text: These slots list all possible Crystal Workbench recipes. Use the gold arrows to change pages.$(br2)If you hover over a recipe, you'll see a tooltip that lists all of the necessary ingredients.

pages.title: Ingredient Drawer
pages.text: These slots are extra storage for recipe components. When you craft an item on the Crystal Workbench, ingredients stored in the drawer are consumed first.$(br2)Braziers of Hoarding will refill slots in the drawer, but only up to one stack.
